hackathon-description-text: Come join us for a fantastic weekend of coding together! Form a team of up to three people and design, develop, and present a project in front of your peers! Schedule for the weekend is as follows:
hackathon-eligibility: In order to be eligible for hackMarist, you must currently be pursuing an undergraduate degree at any university.
hackathon-rules:
Everyone in attendance of hackMarist is required to follow the 
 as well as the following rules:

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment. Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Win a HackHarassment Swag Bag.
Winning team wins Collector's Edition of Watch Dogs® 2
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Watch Dogs® 2 Best Device Privacy Hack
Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=3399 North Rd, Poughkeepsie, NY 12601, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How creative is the idea? How good is it promoting whatever subject it's aimed towards?
How well did the contestant implement the idea?
How well was the project presented?
How much did they learn? How much were they able to improve in the span of 48 hours?
How well was the code put together? Comments?
Extra points for something extra special.
